attributes.action: Stop the abuse of the taxpayer eg MPs vote to keep homes expenses-
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Once again the taxpayer is the one to pick up the cost of these people.

especally the labour party who have destroyed this country with their nonchalent attitude towards the public.

I urge the PM to stamp this out

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
